flex2.compiler.common

Class FontsConfiguration.Languages

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • flex2.compiler.common.FontsConfiguration.Languages
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>
    Enclosing class:
    FontsConfiguration

    public static class FontsConfiguration.Languages
extends Properties
    Defines a subconfiguration for font languages. It contains only a single option, -compiler.fonts.languages.language-range.
    See Also:
